frontMatter.title: Volume of a cylinder
frontMatter.description: Write a program to compute the volume of a Cylinder

contentHtml:
Write a program to compute the volume of a Cylinder

Volume of a cylinder = radius * radius * height * π

Radius : 8
Height : 10

Volume : 2010.62
markdown:
## Write a program to compute the volume of a Cylinder

Volume of a cylinder = radius \* radius \* height \* π

```txt
Radius : 8
Height : 10

Volume : 2010.62
```

---
